abstract: On the day that an article is published about how infrequently kickers miss extra points, two kickers miss extra points.
snippet: On the day that an article is published about how infrequently kickers miss extra points, two kickers miss extra points.
lead_paragraph: Do I owe kickers Mike Nugent and Olindo Mare an apology? On Sunday, the Times published an article I wrote on how infrequently kickers miss extra points.

headline.main: So Much for Perfection: Two Extra Points Missed
